thread.title: One of world's biggest ships arrives in Southampton
thread.title_full: One of world's biggest ships arrives in Southampton | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: One of world's biggest ships arrives in Southampton
text:
The ship can carry 8,500 cars Credit: Mike Pearse The world's largest car carrier has berthed at Southampton as part of its maiden voyage.
The Hoegh Target has capacity for 8,500 cars and deck space of 85,394 square yards. She is visiting the Hampshire port on her journey from East Asia to Europe, and onwards via Africa.
Last updated Tue 8 Sep 2015 Read more 2 updates One of world's biggest ships arrives in Southampton Business
